title: mris_spherical_average
description: This tool adds a template into an average surface in FreeSurfer.

which.title: Which type
which.description: Specifies the type, one of: coords, label, vals, curv, or area.

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: Hemisphere: one of lh or rh.

segment.title: Segment Flag
segment.description: Only use largest connected component of label.

normalize.title: Normalize Flag
normalize.description: Normalize output so it can be interpreted as a probability.

orig.title: Original Surface Name
orig.description: Use <name> as original surface position; default=orig.

output_subject_name.title: Output Subject Name
output_subject_name.description: Use <output subject name> as the space to write the results in instead of the last subject given.

output_subject_dir.title: Output Subject Directory
output_subject_dir.description: Use <output subject dir> as the subjects dir for the output subject.

average_area.title: Average Area Flag
average_area.description: Compute threshold for label that will give the average label approximately the average surface area.

summary_statistics.title: Summary Statistics
summary_statistics.description: Generate summary statistics and write them into sigavg<cond #>-<hemi>.w and sigvar<cond #>-<hemi>.w.
